Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery ostracon, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of six lines of black-painted text, concerning omens or dreams.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393923) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393923)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: D S A Titchener
